option.od: print the help message and exit.
read the configuration from the file configfile.
read the forbidden frequencies from the file freqfile.
use the comma separated list dio as the list of port addresses of DIO cards.
use watchdog as the port address of the watchdog device.
operate in quiet mode, do not log information to the terminal.
include a command ticker that lists the most recent operations.
register the process with the Operating System under the name dioname.
run in debug mode, do not operate the hardware.
write the configuration to standard output and exit.

synopsis.p: Device driver for the PIO48C DIO card.
